title: Equifax Data Breach and Apache Vulnerability Exploitation
description: Consumer credit reporting web application using Apache Struts framework to process sensitive personal data for 147 million consumers.
objectives: Patch all critical vulnerabilities within 48 hours, and implement automated vulnerability scanning with zero tolerance for high-risk components.
test_plan: Automated vulnerability scans, monthly penetration testing, dependency security validation, and Apache Struts specific CVE testing.
defect_management: Critical security bugs escalated to CISO with 24-hour patch requirement, automated ticketing system, and immediate incident response activation.
reviews: Monthly security architecture reviews, quarterly third-party component assessments, and annual compliance audits.
supplier_control: Mandatory security certifications and real-time monitoring of vendor security advisories.
purpose: Prevent data breaches caused by unpatched third-party component vulnerabilities through proactive security governance and rapid response capabilities.
